Language of silk
The Surrealists are creating a sport, the rule which is very easy: each participant takes turns to write with a paper, fold the paper without disclosing this content to others, and then pass the paper to another location one, the rest will probably be completed in exactly the same manner. "Butterfly," "cocoon", "thread", words like these could cause our imagination: a silkworm moth can produce a lot more than 300 eggs. Should you insert them in 2 mulberry trees, you will definately get 300 cocoons, that may be made into silk thread using a duration of 400 to 500 meters, then this silk thread can be woven right into a silk scarf; words like "mythique", "eternel" and "eingulier" make us think about mysterious females, for whom fashion silk scarves decorate their beauty. Ok the makers be sure such situations don't arise, why take risks which too along with your hard earned cash. Imagine the associated costs when the watch needs to be given for repair.

The Lv fashion house was developed in great Paris when his f

Louis Vuitton From Luggage-making To Magnificent Fashion House

Legendary fashion house Lv was founded in 1854. Louis Vuitton gained his reputation in creating luggage. Thats why he became a trunk-maker towards the Napoleon III wife.

For quite some years Lv studied the genuine foundation the what are known as tour-friendly hand baggage. He then made a decision to deconstruct that style. He created very light trunks which has a flat foundation manufactured from wonderful airtight sailcloth. His cases could simply stack and certainly had simple storage.

In this manner Louis Vuitton designed a good travelling bag. The Lv fashion house was developed in great Paris when his first store was opened. He presented supremely made trunks, cases, boxes for hats, different luxury luggage for your voyagers.

Then Louis Vuitton became famous as a designer and many other case makers tried to imitate Louis Vuittons manner. In 1867 there was the universal exhibition in Paris. Lv wanted to stop the current duplication of his look. Thats why in 1876 the Trianon design become light beige and brown stripes.

From the year of 1885, the designer however opened his first variety store in London. By the year of 1888 he designed the Damier Canvas pattern with registered trademark signature. After Louiss death in 1892 the full fashion houses management successfully passed to his son Georges Vuitton.

Georges was happy to transform the business right into a famous corporation which lately showed off its inventions with the Chicago Fair in 1893. Within 3 years the fashion house made the signature Monogram Canvas along the worldwide patents onto it. Its graphic symbols were really based on the outstanding trend of using nice Japanese and delicate Oriental motifs.

Down the road the designer visited numerous big cities in the USA and the man sold Vuitton products there. In 1901 Lv fashion house launched the perfect Steamer Bag a bit piece of handbag inside Vuitton luggage trunks.

By 1913 the worlds largest travel-goods Lv store was opened for the Champs-Elysees. In 1932 the fashion house designed the bag for wine merchants to transport the bottles. A bit later Speedy bag was manufactured. After Georges death in 1936 his son, Gaston-Louis Vuitton, ruled the corporation and turned the whole business right into a well-known intercontinental brand, introducing beautiful purses and nice wallets, womens bags. It absolutely was in 1966 when the Papillon was produced. By 1989 Lv already operated 130 stores.

In 1997 Marc Jacobs, a fresh York designer, suggested profitable clothing business and begun to cooperate with Stephen Sprouse and Takashi Murakami. The expensive fashion company presents ready-to-wear watches, superb, home and want-worthy bags. In 1999 the fashion houses first amazing ready-to-wear distinct outfit appeared.

The Lv brand is well-known across the world. Vuitton goods can be seen in Lv boutiques, concentrated in highquality shopping districts as well as inside rich stores.

Louis Vuitton fashion house has often attracted famous models, magnificent actresses including Jennifer Lopez and Madonna in marketing campaigns. Celebrities in Lv style are Jessica Simpson, Milla Jovovich, Brooke Shields, Anne hathaway, Heidi Klum, Kate Hudson, Claudia Schiffer.
